mapper.select: SELECT A.id AS id, A.version AS version FROM t_app A WHERE A.publishtime = (SELECT MAX(publishtime) FROM t_app WHERE application_id=#{applicationId}) LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_project_user A LEFT OUTER JOIN t_project B ON A.project_id=B.id WHERE A.user_id=#{userId} AND B.application_id=#{applicationId}
SELECT DISTINCT A.id AS id, A.imei AS imei, A.location AS location FROM t_pos A LEFT OUTER JOIN t_app_publish B ON A.id=B.pos_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_app C ON B.app_id=C.id WHERE C.id=#{id}
